name: capmcAPIxnameOnPOSTonComputeNode - Verify xname_on keeps power on for a compute node that is already powered on
fullName: api.2-disruptive.test_xname_on.tavern#capmcAPIxnameOnPOSTonComputeNode - Verify xname_on keeps power on for a compute node that is already powered on

steps.name: Stage 0: capmcAPIxnameOnPOSTonComputeNodeTarget - Retrieve a compute node from HSM to be used in later stages
Stage 1: capmcAPIxnameOnPOSTonComputeNodePrep - Power the target node on to prepare it for the test case
Stage 2: capmcAPIxnameOnPOSTonComputeNodeStatusCheck - Verify that the target node is powered on using get_xname_status
Stage 3: capmcAPIxnameOnPOSTonComputeNodeActual - Power the target node on using xname_on
Stage 4: capmcAPIxnameOnPOSTonComputeNodeStatusCheck - Verify that the target node remained powered on using get_xname_status
